import React from "react" import { Form, Link, useSearchParams } from "react-router-dom" import classes from "./AuthForm.module.css" function AuthForm() { const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useSearchParams() console.log(searchParams.get("mode")) const isLogin = mode === "login" || null return ( <>

{isLogin ? "Log in" : "Create a new user"}

) } export default AuthForm
